pages.title: Gardens
pages.text: Occasionally, you may come across small or large patches of $(6)vegetable gardens $()in the field.$(br2)$(2)Shift+left-click $()to take down the crop and $(2)Shift+right-click $()to take down the vegetable garden.$(br2)You can use these ingredients to cook delicious food.

pages.title: Void Mining
pages.text: First you need to prepare a $(6)Void Botanic Miner$().$(br2)It can collect $(6)Botania Flowers $()in addition to the vanilla $(6) Seeds $() and other items.

pages.title: Hunting
pages.text: Although it's very cold, there are still a few animals out and about, such as the $(d)rabbit$().$(br2)They are fast moving and you can use long-range weapons such as $(6)bow and arrow $() or $(6)to capture them.
